head.citation-title: 2013 2nd International Conference on Mechanics and Control Engineering, ICMCE 2013
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 308 papers. The special focus in this conference is on Mechanics and Control Engineering. The topics include: molecular dynamics simulation of rarefied gaseous flows in nano-channels; study of applying aramid fiber treated insurface to EPDM rubber composite materials; the finite element simulation of surface wrinkling of rigid films on a compliant thin-substrate; structure and magnetic properties of Ga substituted Ni-Ferrites; energy absorption of hybrid composite tubes under axial compression; analysis of crushing laminated composite square tubes under quasi-static loading; hot deformation behavior of TC21 alloy; effect of hot isostatic pressing on fatigue life of cast aluminium alloy-354; scaling laws of wear by slurry abrasion of mild steel; modelling the interatomic potential of cubic zirconia; microstructural evolution of magnesium alloy during hot compression; kinetics and mechanism of palladium pressure-cyanide dissolution; dynamic correlation function of monodispersed colloid; effect of synthesis parameters for lamellar structured nanocrystalline bismuth phosphorus oxide formation; synthesis and characterization of nano-structured mixed oxides; preparation of self-assembled iron oxide nanorings with nano-aluminum; effect of electron thermal carriers on thermal diffusivity of metals; experimental study on the magnetic characteristics of magnetic shape memory alloy materials; prediction of retarded fatigue life due to a single overload spike using an exponential model; study on surface feature of large die and polishing quality during floating polishing; shear wave attenuation and its micro-mechanism of polymers; characteristic of TiN film prepared by multi-arc ion plating; curved layer fused deposition modeling with varying raster orientations; simulation of cold extrusion process of hollow pieces; surface quality of high speed milling of silicon carbide by using diamond coated tool; analysis of hot stamping for automotive structure; evaluating the strength of the friction stir welded joints at various rotational speeds; establishment methods of constitutive equation for metal plastic forming; the design of damping block in the tire tread extrusion die; spontaneous emission of a two-level atom in chiral photonic structures; the study on eri-silk degumming process optimization and its properties; influence of injection molding parameters on the consistency of molding process; research progress of sawing mechanism for free abrasive wire saw; 3D modeling for dynamic response of mixed phase during phase transition; rapid dissociation of cortical neurons from neonate rats and patch-clamp recording; dispersion properties of high pressure emulsified jets; design of a hybrid 5-Axis machine tool with fused-deposition-modeling capability; the out-of-plane stability analysis of crane jib with two symmetric drawbars; load bearing capacity investigation and coating failure mechanism for coated spur gears; uncontrolled generation of synchronous traction motors in EV/HEV/PHEV; analysis of losses and thermal in induction motors; mechanical behavior of wedge adjustment bending device of cold leveler; design optimization of mini multi-nut post harvesting machine; bearing board's force analysis of the rodless drilling set and its prototype test; reduction in finish match grinding cycle time of valve cone through process optimization; design, manufacturing and performance analysis of spiral coil pump; analysis of lubricating oil deterioration in four-wheeler; design of a hybrid 5-Axis machine tool with fused-deposition-modeling capability; effect of dispersed phase viscosity on emulsification in turbulence flow; conceptual aircraft design exploration through functional approach; comparison of two new t-shape standing-wave ultrasonic motors; optimizing leading edge structure for aerosol sampling diffuser; stamping die design of a kind of textile machine needle; welding performance of a homemade friction stir welding tool; design of the new system of verify gas relay; research on velocity-displacement curve for mechanical linkage servo press; performance enhancement of a stack ultrasonic motor using PZNPT material; nonintrusive efficiency estimation of induction motors based on an adaptive extended kalman filter; design and manufacturing of absorber for solar desalination system; vibration characteristics analysis of wind turbine towers under foundation conditions; control of PMSG wind energy conversion system with TS fuzzy state-feedback controller; corrosion conditions analysis of in-service ACSR overhead lines; performance comparison between STATCOM and SVC to enhance power system stability; fundamental frequency estimation in power system through the utilization of sliding window-LMS method; research on topology and performance of grid-connected inverter for direct-driven WGS; an energy integrated solid oxide fuel cell system; solid oxide fuel cell and steam reformer system steady state modeling; a formation system of large-capacity power li-ion battery; economic and energetic analysis for optimizing the length of flat-plate solar air heating collectors; a criticality assessment method for power transmission lines in power system; performance improvement of dye sensitized solar cell by using recycle material for counter electrode; research on nonlinear modeling for power transformer over wide frequency range; modelling interconnection of future combustion engine power plants with traditional grid; review of smart grid demand response with clean energy access; the summary of HVDC commutation failure and example analysis; A CRLH tl transmission line structure and its application to bandpass filter design; design of intelligent concentrator basing on M-Bus and embedded Linux; a multi-channel, 16-Bit, 250[kHz], simultaneous sampling ADC; chromatic confocal displacement measurment based on correlation algorithm; a robust true-color watermarking scheme based on discrete cosine Transform; multiband camera system using color and near infrared images; computerized unripe and ripe durian striking sound recognition using syllable-based HMMs; improved RX algorithm with global statistics; an algorithm for large-scale terrain generation based on quadtree; diagnosis information sharing of weapon equipment based on SOA; analysis of PCB via for signal integrity using ANOVA; a target location algorithm based on image registration; the analysis and solution of a PLL signal source's abnormity; a novel edge detection algorithm of color image; an efficient motion estimation algorithm for H.264/AVC; a file encryption system based on fingerprint-embedded storage; a novel algorithm for MFSK signal classification; a new classification algorithm of MPSK signals based on phase distribution; color face recognition based on quaternion Zernike moment invariants and quaternion BP neural network; vortex tracking algorithm and visualization based on feature flow fields; design and modeling of a CMOS MEMS gravimetric sensor; maintenance tools category integration method based on case analysis; a novel satellite telephone communication system based on SIGSO satellite; game theory and information security; numerical simulation on vortex evolution in the realistic human upper respiratory tract; the research of frame-relay multipoint interface network based on OSPF; the routing protocols for wireless sensor networks; P2P networks considering sybil-proof with the reputation of social link; cellulose-based biodegradable cushioning packaging material; study of residential energy-saving green technology; separation of oil/water emulsion from kitchen using a novel tubular membrane; dynamics of suspended sediments related to fine particles in lower Mekong river; an sample analysis of heavy metal pollution to urban surface soil based on transfer function theory; ways of using rubber crumb from worn tires; rice husk ash for oil spill cleanup; degradation of textile wastewater using solar photocatalysis and SBR; probabilistic analysis of municipal solid waste landfill slope; roadway stability and determination of the critical value of roof abscission layer; instability analysis of coupling seepage and stress field in unsaturated soil; research on performance of SAP warm mix asphalt additive; study on flexural behavior of pre-stressed concrete hollow slabs strengthen with CFRP; experimental research on joints behavior of concrete-filled steel tubular columns; the strength research of pressure pipeline reinforced with CFRP; using of impact-echo methods to assessment of reinforced concrete structures corrosion; dielectric properties of concrete specimens after heat stress; application of computer simulation to mineral processing of shaking-tables; comprehensive assessment of the earthquake emergency response ability of counties; current state of energy consumption and countermeasures of energy saving for iron and steel industry in china; contourlet-1.3 texture retrieval with energy, standard deviation and kurtosis; improvement of production line layout using arena simulation software; a new dispatching model of automated lifting vehicles in automated container terminal with limited buffer space; lateral transfer device for hospital stretcher; rotary hammer forging, a new manufacturing process; the development of a knowledge based system for the process of risk assessment in the workplace; the disclosure mode selection of accounting information based on corporate management structure; hurry path planning based on adaptive genetic algorithm; design and kinematic analysis of parallel robot for ankle rehabilitation and a novel path planning algorithm for autonomous underwater vehicle.

source.issuetitle: Advanced Research in Material Science and Mechanical Engineering

confevent.confname: 2013 2nd International Conference on Mechanics and Control Engineering, ICMCE 2013
